tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE nft_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  nft_name VARCHAR(255),
  nft_owner VARCHAR(255),
  nft_description TEXT,
  nft_image_url TEXT,
  nft_price DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE nft_transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    item_id UUID NOT NULL,
    buyer_id UUID NOT NULL,
    seller_id UUID NOT NULL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE NFT_Tokens (
  nft_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  token_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  token_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  owner_id INT NOT NULL,
  encrypted_data BYTEA
);

CREATE TABLE NFT_Transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  nft_id INT NOT NULL,
  seller_id INT NOT NULL,
  buyer_id INT NOT NULL,
  transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  encrypted_data BYTEA
);

CREATE TABLE NFT_Access_Logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  access_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  action_taken VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  encrypted_data BYTEA
);

CREATE TABLE NFTUsers (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    password BYTEA,
    encryption_key BYTEA
);

CREATE TABLE NFTItems (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT,
    owner_id INT,
    encrypted_data BYTEA
);

CREATE TABLE NFTTransactions (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_hash VARCHAR(64),
    sender_id INT,
    receiver_id INT,
    amount NUMERIC(10,2),
    timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ
);
